description: This simple smoked haddock risotto makes a warming and comforting dinner.
name: Smoked Haddock, Leek & Pea Risotto Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Stir in the peas, flaked haddock, parmesan and lemon juice, cover and set aside for 2 minutes then serve.
